column4: Not really an Ubuntu questions but.. I usually buy my stuff from NewEgg, but someone showed me "Ben's Outlet". The prices seem kind of unbelievable, are they a legit business?
If it's too good to be true, it probably is
I usually buy my stuff from Amazon or Scan, because the good customer service is worth it over the suspiciously-cheap places, and they still are pretty cheap
Yeah, I guess I'll just stick with Amazon/Newegg cause this seems suspect.
